title: An Interdisciplinary Systematic Review on Sustainability in
author: Marco Huymajer; Matthias Woegerbauer; Leopold Winkler; Alexandra Mazak-Huemer; Hubert Biedermann
description: Sustainability is defined by current research as an interdisciplinary field comprising environmental, social, and economic aspects. This paper presents a systematic literature review following the PRI
